# Pull Request Template

## Summary
Provide a clear and concise description of the changes in this PR.

## Type of Change
Select all that apply:
- [ ] Normative change (affects MUST/SHOULD rules)
- [ ] Editorial change
- [ ] Conceptual / architectural clarification
- [ ] Fixes an issue
- [ ] Other (specify below)

## Related Issues
Link any relevant issues here.

## Details
Explain the reasoning behind the change. Include references to specific spec sections.

## Checklist
- [ ] I have read the CONTRIBUTING.md guidelines
- [ ] I have updated or added appropriate examples
- [ ] I have ensured my changes do not break existing normative language
- [ ] I have added tests or validation samples if applicable
